title: Online AI-based test for Parkinson's disease severity shows promising results
summary: AI model uses the Movement Disorder Society Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (MDS-UPDRS) to assess movement disorders and classify the severity of tremors. It generates computational metrics and provides a rapid assessment that is consistent with medical guidebooks. In a study with 250 participants, the AI model performed slightly worse than expert neurologists but outperformed primary care physicians. The researchers believe this AI-based approach can be applied to other movement disorders and improve access to healthcare for patients. However, they caution that it should not be considered a definitive measure without a physician's input.
